articles.title: Cost of premiums, deductibles are an increasing burden on working Americans - BenefitsPro
articles.description: In 2020, health insurance premiums and deductibles ate up 11.6% of Americans' incomes.
articles.content:
Spending per person in employer plans grew by nearly 22% over the period 2015 to 2019, outpacing both inflation and economic growth.
